body.p: More than 10 years ago we started sponsoring the DITA OT Day events, events dedicated to the DITA Open Toolkit project, it's main developers and the community. During this decade we hosted 9 DITA OT Day events, with the 10'th one coming soon on the 1'st of February. On each event we recorded lots of sessions and then made them available online.

I will try to list below links to all presentations made in all the DITA OT Day events so far: DITA OT Day Presentation Recordings
